title: ‘We Stopped for a Pee-Pee and Hid in the Bushes’: How Tadej Pogačar Destroyed Everyone and Set a New Climbing Record
content:
Tadej Pogačar's playful spirit takes center stage as he dominates the Vallter 2000 summit and takes commanding lead in the Volta a Catalunya: 'It was just a little bit of fun.'

Read the full article at ‘We Stopped for a Pee-Pee and Hid in the Bushes’: How Tadej Pogačar Destroyed Everyone and Set a New Climbing Record on Velo.
author: ahood
